11784.quoteText: THE SITE, AND ALL MATERIALS, INFORMATION, ADVICE, JOB LISTINGS, CAREER GUIDE, USER CONTENT, PRODUCTS, FEATURES AND SERVICES AVAILABLE ON OR THROUGH THE SITE ARE PROVIDED “AS IS,” WITH NO WARRANTIES WHATSOEVER, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
11784.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk

tosdr.case: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

11785.quoteText:
Indeed may collect certain information about you and any actions taken by you during your visit using automated means, such as cookies and web beacons.
T
11785.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

11786.quoteText: Additionally, as a Job Seeker, your use of job search on the Site is at no charge and you acknowledge that part of the price you are paying to use this Site is your acceptance of these terms of service including this Class Action Waiver.
11786.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.

11787.quoteText: You waive all claims relating to charges unless claimed within 60 days after the charge (this does not affect your credit card issuer rights).
11787.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

tosdr.case: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

11788.quoteText: We may also use your information in order to show you targeted advertisements and other content that has been customized for you on third-party websites.
11788.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

11789.quoteText: We use cookies, web beacons, and other similar technologies from third-party partners such as Google and Beeswax for measurement services, better targeting advertisements, and for marketing purposes.
11789.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

11790.quoteText: To opt out of the collection and use of information for ad targeting, or to exercise any other rights, please feel free to follow the steps detailed in section 10 of our Privacy Policy.
11790.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

tosdr.case: You can opt out of targeted advertising

13276.quoteText:
Do Not Track Requests

We do not respond to the browser “Do Not Track” (DNT) signal if enabled by the user in their web browser.
13276.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

tosdr.case: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
